properties.entry:
EXPLAIN ANALYZE ( SELECT DISTINCT * FROM ( SELECT csr.rel AS rel, csr.tid AS tid, csr.att AS att, 'person' AS se_rel, prov.tid AS se_tid, 'B10'::varbit AS se_att FROM (SELECT tid, prov_source_tramp_tid , CASE WHEN prov_source_tramp_tid IS NOT NULL THEN 'B1000'::varbit ELSE NULL::varbit END AS prov_source_tramp_att,
prov_source_soupkitchen_tid , NULL AS prov_source_soupkitchen_att,
prov_source_socialworker_tid , NULL AS prov_source_socialworker_att,
prov_source_socialworker_1_tid, CASE WHEN prov_source_socialworker_1_tid IS NOT NULL THEN 'B010'::varbit ELSE NULL END AS prov_source_socialworker_1_att FROM (SELECT PROVENANCE ON CONTRIBUTION (COPY PARTIAL TRANSITIVE) tid, name FROM target.person) AS psub) AS prov, csr WHERE (csr.prov_source_tramp_tid = prov.prov_source_tramp_tid AND csr.prov_source_tramp_att | prov.prov_source_tramp_att != 'B0000'::varbit) OR (csr.prov_source_socialworker_1_tid = prov.prov_source_socialworker_1_tid AND csr.prov_source_socialworker_1_att | prov.prov_source_socialworker_1_att != 'B000'::varbit) AND (csr.tid != prov.tid OR csr.att & 'B10'::varbit = 'B00'::varbit) UNION ALL SELECT csr.rel AS rel, csr.tid AS tid, csr.att AS att, 'person' AS se_rel, prov.tid AS se_tid, 'B01'::varbit AS se_att FROM (SELECT tid, prov_source_tramp_tid , NULL::varbit AS prov_source_tramp_att,
prov_source_soupkitchen_tid , CASE WHEN prov_source_soupkitchen_tid IS NOT NULL THEN 'B010'::varbit ELSE NULL::varbit END AS prov_source_soupkitchen_att,
prov_source_socialworker_tid , NULL::varbit AS prov_source_socialworker_att,
prov_source_socialworker_1_tid, NULL AS prov_source_socialworker_1_att FROM (SELECT PROVENANCE ON CONTRIBUTION (COPY PARTIAL TRANSITIVE) tid, livesin FROM target.person) AS psub) AS prov, csr WHERE (csr.prov_source_soupkitchen_tid = prov.prov_source_soupkitchen_tid AND csr.prov_source_soupkitchen_att | prov.prov_source_soupkitchen_att != 'B0000'::varbit) AND (csr.tid != prov.tid OR csr.att & 'B01'::varbit = 'B00'::varbit)) AS se)
